doc.title: Babylon
doc.plot: A 12 year-old Jamaican boy from the ghettos of Kingston("CASPAR"), a Rasta from the isolated hills of Jamaica ("JEREMIAH") and a white British Reverend ("Rev. MILLER") must out run gangsters in a chase across Jamaica, if they hope to save the young boy's father from certain death. In the course of their perilous journey, the unlikely trio find not only common ground but enlightenment.
